arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1732227500000_o4p5q6r7s", "workspaceId": "ws_1732227500000_t8u9v0w1x", "sessionDescription": "Updating privacy policy", "sessionMemory": "Privacy policy updated last month for EU expansion. Using append ensures no existing content loss.", "primaryGoal": "Ensure legal compliance for EU operations", "subgoal": "Add GDPR compliance section to privacy policy"}, "filePath": "Legal/Privacy-Policy.md", "content": "

## GDPR Compliance

We comply with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR). Users have the right to:
- Access their data
- Request data deletion
- Data portability
- Withdraw consent"}

Add troubleshooting section to user guide

tool_call: contentManager_appendContent
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1732228850000_p1q2r3s4t", "workspaceId": "ws_1732228850000_u5v6w7x8y", "sessionDescription": "Enhancing user guide", "sessionMemory": "User guide deployed with v2.0. Based on real support tickets from first week of deployment.", "primaryGoal": "Reduce support ticket volume", "subgoal": "Add troubleshooting guide to user documentation"}, "filePath": "Docs/User-Guide.md", "content": "

## Troubleshooting

### Login Issues
If you cannot log in, try:
1. Clear browser cache
2. Reset password
3. Contact support

### Performance Issues
For slow performance:
1. Close unused tabs
2. Check internet connection
3. Update browser"}
